title.narrative: Capacities of ministries and preschool institutions to insrease preschool enrolment and to provide access to quality ECE and ECI services for most vulenerable girls and boys

description.narrative: Sustained advocacy and support by UNICEF contributed to an increase in preschool enrolment of children in the year prior to primary school. Preschool teachers enhanced their capacities in the area of early childhood interventions as a result of UNICEF support to the Ministry of Education of Republika Srpska in rolling out a comprehensive capacity development programme. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/12/2019
